### Specialized DNA Library Services for Oat and Barley
#### Reference Information
* Reference Number: PW-22-01008372
* Solicitation Number: 01B46-22-100
* Publication Date: 2022-09-27
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-11T14:00:00

#### Government Notice Details
* Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Contracting Entity: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* End User Entity: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada

#### Service Description
The Ottawa Regulatory Development Centre (RDC) requires a service contract from a qualified supplier to prepare sequencing-ready DNA-barcoded complexity-reduced “GbS” libraries from customer-supplied DNA samples. The libraries will also be processed by RAPTURE (gene capture) for oat samples. The service contract will be valid until March 31, 2023.

#### Statement of Capabilities
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the services described herein may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified below. The statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the stated requirements.

#### Contact Information
* Contact Name: Claudia Lauzier
* Contact Email: [claudia.lauzier@agr.gc.ca](mailto:claudia.lauzier@agr.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: 438-455-2392
* Contracting Entity Address: 1341 Baseline Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0C5, Canada

#### Tender Documentation
The tender documentation is available at the following URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/27/74242c9256656f4b5068987d1a434872/pac-acan_22-100.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/27/74242c9256656f4b5068987d1a434872/pac-acan_22-100.pdf)

#### Inquiries and Submission of Statements of Capabilities
All inquiries and submission of statements of capabilities will be communicated via email: [aafc.escprocurement-cseapprovisionnement.aac@agr.gc.ca](mailto:aafc.escprocurement-cseapprovisionnement.aac@agr.gc.ca)
